title: Scarlett's Worrying Interests | American Horror Stories - Episode 1: "Rubber (Wo)man - Part One"
author: AHS Crave
comment: Though I am excited to see Matt Bomer in a brand new role again...it's disappointing that he is always getting kinda typecast in a gay role.. Cmon man this guy is insanely talented (just watch him in non gay roles in The Last Tycoon, The Sinner...) how come Hollywood is ignoring him for bigger projects?? 🤔😕
I don’t like Scarlett. She’s always moody, killed 4 girls, psychopathic…
description:
Scarlett's dads (Matt Bomer & Gavin Creel) confront their daughter about her unusual & disturbing tastes in pornography. 

American Horror Stories, the official American Horror Story spin-off series, is property of 20th Television, FX Networks, & Hulu - stream it now, exclusively on FX on Hulu.
